dataObject.content: Trump, who opted against giving a Super Bowl pregame interview last year, made several eyebrow-raising remarks during his interview with host Margaret Brennan, touching on topics including his plan to withdraw U.S. troops from Syria and whether he would let his 12-year-old son play football.

annotationData.content: {"category":{"label":"Biased"},"rationale":"For the most part it is simple facts but adding in eye-brow raising remarks turned it into more of an opinion based bias."}
{"category":{"label":"Biased"},"rationale":"The eyebrow-raising explanation is totally unnecessery and seem a way to caricature Trump more than a way to explicitely relate a fact. Biased"}

dataObject.content: Hundreds of white nationalists lined the streets of Charlottesville, Va., last Saturday to protest the removal of a Confederate monument. Some waved Confederate and Nazi flags, others brandished shields.

annotationData.content: {"category":{"label":"Biased"},"rationale":"Biased. Putting everyone their into the bubble of white nationalist is an assumption. An ordinary person could be involved in protesting the removal of a historical monument based on merit alone."}
{"category":{"label":"Unbiased"},"rationale":"No emotion is related there or some stretching of the reality. It's all facts. Unbiased"}
